items.title: Amazon to Cut 16,000 Jobs in Latest Round of Layoffs

items.title: The Rise and Fall of South Korean First Lady Kim Keon Hee
items.content_html: Kim Keon Hee was unlike any presidential spouse South Korea had seen. Her downfall, on corruption charges, came after her husband declared martial law.

items.title: How Losing Her Limbs Turned Cooking Columnist Yewande Komolafe Into a Different Kind of Cook
items.content_html: Two years ago, our cooking columnist Yewande Komolafe woke from a coma and soon learned her body would be profoundly altered. She recounts her journey back to the kitchen, and to herself.

items.title: Man Rushes Ilhan Omar at Minneapolis Town Hall and Sprays Her

items.title: Storm Tests Mamdani as Dangerous Cold Grips New York
